tha-ap274:0.3_0: Woetting Hasana, so hard to find,
tha-ap274:1.2_0: the Teacher is the Elder of the world.
tha-ap274:2.2_0: having honored the supreme among men,
tha-ap274:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap274:4.1_0: When the sixteen-four is sixteen years old,
tha-ap274:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap274:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kūṭadanta.
tha-ap274:7.1_0: Going forward to the senior monks.
